name: Youda Farmer 2
summary:
“A whole new farming adventure”  
  
Rebuild your farm and the villagers’ favorite shops to recover from the evil tricks of a real estate developer trying to take over the nostalgic little village!  
  
When the mayor calls for your assistance to fight ‘Big Boss’, your adventure to help the poor villagers starts by quickly gathering materials to rebuild the destroyed buildings.  
  
Refine natural materials to various dishes and products using the right machinery and supply the recovered retailers with these great homegrown products.  
  
Earn rewards for making combos and retry levels to improve your achievements.
